briefTitle: A Study for Patients Who Completed VITALITY-ALS (CY 4031)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-Label Extension Study of Tirasemtiv for Patients With Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS) Who Completed VITALITY-ALS (CY 4031)
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the long-term safety and tolerability of tirasemtiv in patients with ALS who had completed the double-blind placebo-controlled study of tirasemtiv in ALS (CY 4031).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From the first dose of tirasemtiv through 28 days after the last dose
